## ğŸš€ Issues Found & Fixed

### âœ… Issue #1: CSS Syntax Error (FIXED)
**Severity:** ğŸ”´ High  
**File:** `client/src/styles/Mobile.css`  
**Line:** 619  
**Problem:** Invalid CSS property outside selector

**Before:**
```css
@media print {
    a { text-decoration: underline; }
    page-break-avoid: avoid;  âŒ INVALID
}
```

**After:**
```css
@media print {
    a { text-decoration: underline; }
    * { page-break-inside: avoid; }  âœ… FIXED
}
```
